mapper.insert: insert into t_driver ( user_code, province_code, city_code, area_code, is_deleted, create_name, create_time, version ) values ( #{userCode}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{areaCode}, #{isDeleted}, #{createName}, now(), 0 )

insert into t_sys_user (user_code, user_acct, user_password, user_name, sex, phone, email, id_card, role, is_deleted, create_name, create_time, version ) values ( #{userCode}, #{userAcct}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{idCard}, 3, #{isDeleted}, #{createName}, now(), 0 )
mapper.select:
select a.user_code userCode, a.user_acct userAcct, a.user_name userName, a.phone phone, a.id_card idCard, a.version version from t_sys_user a where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.role = 3
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
order by create_time desc
mapper.update: update t_driver set user_name = #{userName}, user_acct = #{userAcct}, id_card = #{idCard}, phone = #{phone}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, update_time = now(), update_name = #{updateName}, version = version + 1 where user_code = #{userCode} and version = #{version} and role = 3
mapper.select: select user_code userCode, user_name userName, user_acct userAcct, user_password userPassword, phone, id_card idCard, province_code provinceCode, city_code cityCode, area_code areaCode, is_deleted isDeleted, create_name createName, create_time createTime, update_name updateName, update_time updateTime, version from t_sys_user where user_code = #{userCode} and is_deleted = 0 and role = 3
